name: A. Black Square
statement:
Quite recently, a very smart student named Jury decided that lectures
are boring, so he downloaded a game called "" on his super cool
touchscreen phone.In this game, the phone’s screen is divided into four
vertical strips. Each second, a black square appears on some of the
strips. According to the rules of the game, Jury must use this second to
touch the corresponding strip to make the square go away. As Jury is
both smart and lazy, he counted that he wastes exactly calories on
touching the -th strip.You’ve got a string , describing the process of
the game and numbers . Calculate how many calories Jury needs to destroy
all the squares?
